items.name: Pillars Pilsner Pint Delivery
items.desc:
FRESH BEER DELIVERED IN 2 & 4 PINT CARTONS. DRINK FRESH WITHIN 24 HOURS OF DELIVERY. ORDER BEFORE 3PM FOR SAME DAY DELIVERY. DELIVERY DAY CAN BE SELECTED AT CHECKOUT.
THE WORLDS MOST POPULAR BEER STYLE IS GIVEN THE PILLARS TREATMENT. 4%, GLUTEN FREE AND VEGAN-FRIENDLY. A PILSNER FOR THE PEOPLE.
STYLE: PILSNER
ABV: 4.0%

items.name: Pillars Tropical Pilsner
items.desc:
SUMMER BEER IS HERE AND IT'S TOTALLY TROPICAL, MAN! OUR BEST SELLING PILLARS PILSNER WITH A WITH A MOUTH-WATERING FRUITY TWIST. MEET TROPICAL PILSNER! INFUSED WITH GUAVA, PINEAPPLE, MANGO AND LYCHEE. PERFECT FOR BBQS AND GARDEN GARDEN CHILL TIMES.
STYLE: PILSNER
ABV: 4.0%
Pillars Tropical Pilsner keg (5 litres - just under 9 pints of beer)
